H0.text: With what country did the United States re-establish diplomatic relations in 2015. Iran

H1.text: With what country did the United States re-establish diplomatic relations in 2015. Syria

H2.text: With what country did the United States re-establish diplomatic relations in 2015. Venezuela

H3.text: With what country did the United States re-establish diplomatic relations in 2015. Cuba

A4.text: Relations between Cuba and the United States were formally re-established on 20 July 2015.

A5.text: On 1 July 2015, President Barack Obama announced that formal diplomatic relations between Cuba сезон the United States would resume.
